short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds accessibii lity features to Howrse.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides accessibility features for Howrse, including the following:
- Info Icons to Horse Names
- Extra Buttons/Shortcuts to Horse Pages
- Preset Foal Name Inputs
- Preset Foal Breeding Farm to Parent Breeding Farm

And more to come!
